title: Skylo’s network to spread in 2024
summary: In recent months, Skylo has established partnerships with chipset manufacturers, satellite fleet operators and telecommunications providers.

title: Investing in Space: On satellites, the invisible backbone of global industry
summary: “Space-based technologies are the building blocks of innovation on Earth. GPS, geospatial intelligence and satellite communications are the invisible backbone that powers the world’s largest industries today.”

title: In annual report to Congress, Pentagon highlights China’s ‘refusal to engage’
summary: China’s continued pursuits of space technologies as a way to gain military superiority are once again highlighted in the Pentagon’s latest annual report on “Military and Security Developments Involving the People’s Republic of China.”

title: Artemis and Taming the Extraordinary
summary: Strategists and planners at NASA are mulling over questions of tempo for future human expeditions to the moon. Should Artemis involve a yearly campaign of smaller missions or consolidate expeditions, launching more ambitious (and, therefore, sporadic) efforts less often?

title: Cognitive Space wins two SDA contracts
summary: Cognitive Space said securing two SDA phase 2 awards in a matter of weeks underscores the value of the company’s Cognitive Inference Tasking (CNTIENT) software platform.
